thread.title_full: POTD: Coronation Street newcomer Kate Connor infuriates Beth Sutherland - Coronation Street News - Soaps - Digital Spy

author: Daniel Kilkelly
title: POTD: Coronation Street newcomer Kate Connor infuriates Beth Sutherland - Coronation Street Soaps -
text: Coronation Street newcomer Kate Connor shows her mischievous side tonight (October 16) as she fakes a romantic interest in Kirk Sutherland.Kate (Faye Brookes) decides to teach Kirk's wife Beth a lesson after the gobby factory worker gets the wrong idea about her intentions.When Kate starts work at Underworld and is placed in the packing department with Kirk, it doesn't take long before Beth (Lisa George) is jealous and worried about a potential love rival.Rather than correct Beth by revealing that she's actually engaged to a female soldier, Kate winds her up by pretending to make advances towards Kirk. With Beth livid, will it be handbags at dawn? Â© ITVBeth sees red over Kate's behaviour Coronation Street airs tonight at 7.30pm and 8.30pm on ITV.Read our full spoiler for tonight's first Coronation Street episodeRead our full spoiler for tonight's second Coronation Street episodeRead more Coronation Street spoilers and newsDigital Spy Soap Scoop video - hit play below for gossip on more Gloved Hand Killer deaths in Hollyoaks, the reveal of Robert Sugden's shooter in Emmerdale, a drastic decision from Kathy Beale in EastEnders and Alya Nazir's guilt spiralling out of control in Coronation Street. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4551550723001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14551550723001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4551550723001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4551550723001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14551550723001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4551550723001.init(); ai_type="video"; } Get the Inside Soap magazine on your iPhone or iPad
